get.summary: Account details for a user that has logged in

set-cookie.description: 1. `authenticated` cookie set to `yes` when the user has successfully authenticated

isDDPUser.description: is the user currently a ddp user

isDDPRenewable.description: is the user able to renew their expired or expiring ddp subscription. Becomes active when the user has 1 month remaining on their current subscription.

ddpStartDate.description: When did their DDP subscription start.

ddpEndDate.description: When will their DDP subscription end.

wasDDPUser.description: Has the user ever had DDP?

ddpCurrentOrderCount.description: How many order has the user placed during their current DDP subscription

ddpPreviousOrderCount.description: How many order has the user placed during their previous DDP subscription

ddpCurrentSaving.description: Approximate amount of savings accrued by the DDP User during their current DDP subscription.

ddpPreviouSaving.description: Approximate amount of savings accrued by the DDP User during their previous DDP subscription.

ddpStandardPrice.description: Standard price of DDP for this brand.

ddpExpressDeliveryPrice.description: Standard cost of express delivery for this brand.

get.summary: Get the details of a specific order a customer has made

statusCode.description:
Unique character idenitfier for a status
              * `C` - Your order is currently being packed by our warehouse
              * `W` - Pending Fraud Check
              * `M` - Pending Payment Authorisation
              * `G` - Order Shipment delayed
              * `S` - Shipped
              * `c` - Collected
              * `r` - returned to stock
              * `i` - Ready to Collect
              * `D` - Dispatched
              * `X` - Your order has been cancelled

isOrderFullyRefunded.description: Flag to determine if all items in order have been refunded i.e. user cannot start a new return

deliveryType.description:
Different delivery types
            * H - Home delivery
            * P - Parcel
            * S - Collect from store

deliveryOptions.description: List of available delivery options for the basket

deliveryOptionId.description: Internal code representing the delivery option

label.description: UI label for the delivery option

plainLabel.description: UI label for the delivery option

selected.description: Whether the option is currently selected or not

enabled.description: Whether the delivery method is currently enabled or not

discounts.description: Array of discounts applied to the order (including gift cards)

inventoryPositions.description: List of items with details for FFS fulfillment. This will contain as many properties as there are items in the bag, but due to Swagger limitations only one is shown.

products.description: Array of items in the basket.

ageVerificationRequired.description: Shows if the item requires the customer to verify if they are an adult.

assets.description: Array of image assets for the product

attributes.description: The attributes of the product, if any

bundleProducts.description: Other products included in the bundle, if any

catEntryId.description: The category entry ID number of the product

colourSwatches.description: Swatch colours for this product, if any

inStock.description: Flag showing if the product is in stock

isBundleOrOutfit.description: Flag showing if the product is part of a bundle

lineNumber.description: Unique code determining what line the product is in the basket

lowStock.description: Flag showing if stock for the product is low

name.description: The product's name as shown to consumers

orderItemId.description: Unique number relating the item to the order it is placed in. Differs for each item

productId.description: Code for the product encompassing all sizes, swatches etc.

quantity.description: Amount of the product added to the basket

totalPrice.description: The price for the entire quantity of the item, after discounts or promotions applied

unitPrice.description: The price for one of the item, including any discounts but not factoring in promotions applied

promotionId.description: If the product is included in a promotion, the ID of that specific promotion

promotionLabel.description: Text describing the specific promotion the product is included in

promotionText.description: Text that is displayed if the item is on a promotion
promotionText.example: This is part of a promotion!

deliveryLocationType.description: String representing the location of the delivery

deliveryMethods.description: Array of methods available for that delivery location (express, standard, etc.)

additionalDescription.description: Extra information shown in the UI about the delivery

deliveryOptions.description: Array of available options for that delivery method (e.g. different possible days for express delivery)

deliveryType.description: String summarizing the type of delivery

label.description: UI label for that delivery type

selected.description: Flag showing if the delivery method is currently selected

shipCode.description: Internal code specific to that delivery method

shipModeId.description: Internal code specific to that delivery method, delivery type, and delivery location

label.description: UI label for the delivery location
label.example: Home Delivery Standard (UK up to 4 days; worldwide varies)  Express (UK next or nominated day; worldwide varies)

selected.description: Flag representing if that delivery location is selected

deliveryMessage.example: Order in 10 hrs 29 mins for next day delivery

description.example: Smart shapes come updated for now in '70s inspired suede textures. This button front dress comes with a flattering V-neck and a fitted silhouette. 100% Polyester. Machine wash.  <BR><B>**PLEASE NOTE THIS ITEM CAN ONLY BE RETURNED VIA POST. STORES ARE UNABLE TO RETURN THESE ITEMS FOR YOU. ALL UK POSTAL RETURNS ARE FREE. INTERNATIONAL POSTAL CHARGES WILL VARY.</B>

isDDPUser.description: is the user currently a ddp user

isDDPRenewable.description: is the user able to renew their expired or expiring ddp subscription. Becomes active when the user has 1 month remaining on their current subscription.

ddpStartDate.description: When did their DDP subscription start.

ddpEndDate.description: When will their DDP subscription end.

wasDDPUser.description: Has the user ever had DDP?

ddpCurrentOrderCount.description: How many order has the user placed during their current DDP subscription

ddpPreviousOrderCount.description: How many order has the user placed during their previous DDP subscription

ddpCurrentSaving.description: Approximate amount of savings accrued by the DDP User during their current DDP subscription.

ddpPreviouSaving.description: Approximate amount of savings accrued by the DDP User during their previous DDP subscription.

ddpStandardPrice.description: Standard price of DDP for this brand.

ddpExpressDeliveryPrice.description: Standard cost of express delivery for this brand.

label.example: Home Delivery Standard (UK up to 4 working days; worldwide varies) Express (UK next or nominated day; worldwide varies)

userType.description: G: Guest order; R: Returning customer placed an order; A: Customer placed an order but not registered on same day; S: Customer placed an order registering on same day;

ddcJwt.description: JSON Web Token (JWT) for Device Data Collection (DDC)
